paragraphs.title: SJT CTS(Control Tower System)
paragraphs.text:
import pandas as pd
from pprint import pprint as p
import numpy as np
import pymysql
import time
from datetime import datetime
import datetime as dt
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
conn=pymysql.connect(host='106.10.51.40',port=3306,user='root',password='tmwlsxm!19',db='sjt')
curs = conn.cursor()

paragraphs.title: 전체 환자 수
paragraphs.text:
# curs.execute('select count(id) from sjt_user')
# totalPatientNum = curs.fetchall()[0][0]
# print(totalPatientNum)
print(24)

paragraphs.title: Black
paragraphs.text:
sql='select count(groupingByPatient.triage) from (select * from sjt.sjt_device_data group by patientId) groupingByPatient where groupingByPatient.triage = "black";'
curs.execute(sql)
result=list(curs.fetchall())
result[0][0]

paragraphs.title: Red
paragraphs.text:
sql='select count(groupingByPatient.triage) from (select * from sjt.sjt_device_data group by patientId) groupingByPatient where groupingByPatient.triage = "red";'
curs.execute(sql)
result=list(curs.fetchall())
result[0][0]

paragraphs.title: Yellow
paragraphs.text:
sql='select count(groupingByPatient.triage) from (select * from sjt.sjt_device_data group by patientId) groupingByPatient where groupingByPatient.triage = "yellow";'
curs.execute(sql)
result=list(curs.fetchall())
result[0][0]

paragraphs.title: Green
paragraphs.text:
sql='select count(groupingByPatient.triage) from (select * from sjt.sjt_device_data group by patientId) groupingByPatient where groupingByPatient.triage = "green";'
curs.execute(sql)
result=list(curs.fetchall())
result[0][0]

paragraphs.title: 환자 리스트
paragraphs.text:
sql = 'select su.name as name, su.age as age, su.isMail as isMail, \
ifnull((select triage from sjt_device_data where patientId = su.id order by id desc limit 1), "unknown") as triage, \
ifnull((select outComplain from sjt_device_data where patientId = su.id order by id desc limit 1), "unknown") as outComplain \
from sjt_user su'

curs.execute(sql)
result=list(curs.fetchall())
su_list=pd.DataFrame(list(result))
su_list.columns=['Name','Age','Male','Triage','Chief_Complain']
z.show(su_list)
# su_list

paragraphs.title: 외부 물자 리스트
paragraphs.text:
sql='select doctorNum, nurseNum, emtNum, officeNum, bloodPackNum, energyPackNum, medicineNum, oneHospitalNum, twoHospitalNum, threeHospitalNum, oneBadNum, twoBadNum, threeBadNum from sjt_external_item'
curs.execute(sql)
result=list(curs.fetchall())
external_item_list=pd.DataFrame(list(result))
external_item_list.columns=['doctorNum','nurseNum','emtNum','officeNum','bloodPackNum','energyPackNum','medicineNum','oneHospitalNum','twoHospitalNum','threeHospitalNum','oneBadNum','twoBadNum','threeBadNum']
# t_external_item_list=external_item_list.T
temp=external_item_list.values.tolist()
pd.DataFrame(temp.insert(0,['의사 수','간호사 수','구급인력 수','행정인력 수','혈액 제재','외상키트 수','수액 수','인근 일차병원 수','인근 이차병원 수','인근 삼차병원 수','일차병원 병상 수','이차병원 병상 수','삼차병원 병상 수']))
temp=pd.DataFrame(temp).T
temp.columns=['Item','Count']
temp
z.show(temp)

paragraphs.title: SBP(수축기 혈압)
paragraphs.text:
pid = 1
startTime = datetime(2010,7,3,13,7,30)
startUnixTime = int(time.mktime(startTime.timetuple()))
endTime = datetime(2010,7,3,13,12,30)
endUnixTime = int(time.mktime(endTime.timetuple()))
pid = 1
sql = 'SELECT sbp,rr,hr,saO2 FROM sjt_device_data WHERE  patientId = {} AND from_unixtime({}) < time AND from_unixtime({})'
curs.execute(sql.format(pid,startUnixTime,endUnixTime))
vital_data = curs.fetchall()
time_list = []
vital_list = [[],[],[],[]]
a=0
for i in vital_data[0:60]:
    time_list.append(a)
    for index in range(0,4):
        if index == 1:
            vital_list[index].append(round(float(i[index]),2))
        else:
            vital_list[index].append(i[index])
    a += 1
df_sbp=pd.DataFrame(vital_list[0])
df_sbp.reset_index(level=0, inplace=True)
df_sbp.columns=['Time','SBP']
z.show(df_sbp)
